caption:
The photograph presents an aerial view of a formal landscape composed of several elements. At the center, a symmetrical concrete pathway leads up a wide set of steps flanked by lush greenery. The greenery includes neatly trimmed hedges and a variety of trees, adding a rich, natural texture to the scene. Beside the steps is a flagpole with the American flag, creating a focal point in the composition.

On either side of the central pathway and flag, the asphalt creates a looping driveway used for parking. This driveway is shaped in a 'U' that surrounds a small landscaped island with a single tree and neatly maintained hedges. Parked on either side of the driveway are several cars, indicating either a day of moderate activity at this location or designated parking.

In the bottom left corner, the asphalt widens into a parking lot with more cars neatly arranged in bays marked by white lines. This suggests a formal, possibly governmental or corporate, setting. The photograph captures two individuals walking on the path, providing a sense of scale and activity. Their presence, along with the parked cars and the institutional landscape design, suggests this might be a location of significance or public interest, possibly a government institution or memorial park. The overall ambiance is orderly and serene, emphasizing the importance and formality of the setting.
title: In front of national institutes of health, bethesda Maryland
